## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] No console warnings or errors in browser
- [ ] No ESLint errors or warnings
- [ ] No TypeScript errors
- [ ] Code is formatted with Prettier

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested the changes in a real browser (Chrome/Firefox/Safari)
- [ ] I have tested keyboard navigation and accessibility
- [ ] No accessibility violations (`jest-axe` passes)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new/changed APIs
- [ ] I have added demo/example code if applicable
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated with user-facing changes (if applicable)

### Breaking Changes

<!-- Only if this is a breaking change -->

- [ ] Migration guide provided
- [ ] Deprecation warnings added (if applicable)
- [ ] Major version bump planned
